desc.p: This is a multi valued field. Standard T24 alphanumeric field.
A maximum of 35 characters may be entered.
This is a NOINPUT field.
Fields NEW.INT.RATE to NEW.RATE.EFF form a related multi value set. Standard T24 date field.
A maximum of 11 characters may be entered.
This is a multi valued field. This is a sub valued language field. Standard T24 alphanumeric field.
Mandatory input.
A maximum of 35 characters may be entered.
This field indicates the method that will be followed if the cycled interest settlement date is a non working day in the relative currency.
The following provides an explanation of the various input values for this field
Null = Calendar The sysem will use the same date irrespective of whether dates cycled are working days or not.
1 = Forward The system will cycle forward to the next available working day.
2 = Backward The system will cycle to the previous working day.
3 = Fwd Same Month The system will cycle forward unless the next working day unless it falls in the next month. In this case, it will cycle to the previous working day.
Validation
A single numeric value in the range 1-3 or Null.
Null = Calendar
1 = Forward
2 = Backward
3 = Forward same month
Single Value Optional input
Fields INTEREST.RATE to RATE.EFF.DATE form a related multi value set. Standard T24 date field.
A maximum of 11 characters may be entered.
This is a NOCHANGE field.
Fields INTEREST.RATE to RATE.EFF.DATE form a related multi value set. Standard T24 rate field.
A maximum of 11 characters may be entered.
This is a NOCHANGE field.
Standard T24 date field.
A maximum of 11 characters may be entered.
This is a NOINPUT field.
A maximum of 13 characters may be entered.
This field is reserved for future expansion.
This is a NOINPUT field.
Standard T24 rate field.
A maximum of 11 characters may be entered.
This is a NOINPUT field.
This field is reserved for future expansion.
This is a NOINPUT field.
Fields NEW.INT.RATE to NEW.RATE.EFF form a related multi value set. Standard T24 rate field.
A maximum of 11 characters may be entered.
Defines if automatic allocation of INTEREST.RATE since END.OF.DAY is used to calculate the new interest rate of Notice Deposit. Only for inside group notice deposit, and by bank
Standard T24 alphanumeric field.
A maximum of 18 characters may be entered.
Standard T24 rate field.
Mandatory input.
A maximum of 11 characters may be entered.
This is a NOCHANGE field.
Standard T24 numeric field.
A maximum of 2 characters may be entered.
